title: Output Shaft - Inspection

body.body: Examine all gears, bearings and bushes and thrust washers for damage, distortion, chipped teeth and wear beyond the service limits. Replace all defective components and always use new circlips, a new output shaft seal and a new sprocket tab washer to assemble the shaft.
